Text.val: -- Author: Asaf Kehati
28.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Task "Detail lines" Removed casting to char in DSQL
15.11.2012 AS SCR#17691 fixed form output with expressions where attribute was ANSI instead of Unicode
03.01.2012 SH SCR17016 Changed DBHS_VALUE_NEW/OLD for unicode support
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
16.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
15.10.2007 SH SCR12978 Changed BXA900.PI.PAPER ('N' if PI.TYPE = 1 else 'Y')
07.08.2007 SH SCR12773 Changed BXA900.PI.PAPER to ='N'
12.11.2006 AK SCR12083 added deposit reductions (CDRD) for PI.TYPE 2/3/4
01.11.2006 AK SCR12067 fixed bug for PI.TYPE='1'
20.09.2006 AK SCR11803 added group level and header only for PI.TYPE>'1'
31.08.2006 AK SCR11803 add lists :guarantees, arrangements,overdraft table(CDEP)
22.06.2006 AK SCR11476 add some filters to the SQL query in task "detail lines"
14.06.2006 AK SCR11396 change PI.NUMBERFREE sended to BXA900 from 0 to 1
12.04.2006 AK SCR10926 change access mode of tables CODE to READ
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CLNT
PI.TYPE : 1 = Client related tables2= Guarantees3 = Arrangements4 = Overdrawings
variables to set as comment a part of the SQL statement in task 'detail lines'
-- Uses to switch system language to general language (=report language) and
back to user language if report is created
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- Get user language, uses to switch back to user language if report was produce
online
-- report has to be printed in GNRL_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
set PI.TYPE default value (if empty)
set comment variables according to the type of the report (PI.TYPE)
set v.HEADER according to the type of the report (PI.TYPE)
set rang value for table CDEP (only relevant for PI.TYPE = 2, 3 or 4)
-- Get values from GENERAL
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to GNRL_LANGUAGE, in which report has to be produced
-- Start creation of XML report
-- Switch system language back to user language
-- Textfields which used in BXA460A for the heading lines
-- Column Headings used in BXA460A
Get REPA_JOURNALNO (uses also to build the XML file names)
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Build static text fields
-- Reportheader
-- Columntitels
Store REPORT- ARCHIVE
Write XML header
BXA450A Heading lines
BXA503B Print lines on the report
-- Produce final XML-File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523 (35)

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX, substr(DBHS.DBHS_KEY,1,20) as DBHS_KEY, substr(DBHS.DBHS_KEY,1,10) as CLIENT, QCOL.QCOL_ORDER_BXA460, QCOL.QCOL_SUBORDER_BXA460, QCOL.ALIASNAME, DBHS.DBHS_FIELD_NAME, DBHS.DBHS_USER, DBHS.DBHS_DATE, DBHS.DBHS_TIME, DBHS.DBHS_VALUE_NEW, DBHS.DBHS_VALUE_OLD, DBHS.DBHS_VALIDATION_DATE
FROM :1/DBHS AS DBHS join :2/QCOL as QCOL on QCOL.NAME=DBHS.DBHS_FIELD_NAME and QCOL_ENABLE_BXA460='Y'
where DBHS.DBHS_VALIDATION_DATE between ':3' and ':4' and ( :7 DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLNT' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CMCD' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CCRY' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CCRC' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLIT' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLBC' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLMB' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLMC' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CMBT' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLPC' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CLRC' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CSEC' :9 or :8 DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CDEP' or DBHS.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='CDRD' :10 ) and substr(DBHS.DBHS_KEY,1,4)< '0100' and DBHS.DBHS_USER<>'MAGIC' and not(DBHS_TYPE_PICTURE = 'DD/MM/YYYY' and DBHS_VALUE_NEW='00000000' and DBHS_VALUE_OLD='') :7 union
SELECT BLHS.BLHS_TAB_PREFIX, BLHS.BLHS_KEY, substr(BLHS.BLHS_KEY,1,10) as CLIENT, QCOL.QCOL_ORDER_BXA460, QCOL.QCOL_SUBORDER_BXA460, QCOL.ALIASNAME, BLHS.BLHS_FIELD_NAME, BLHS.BLHS_USER, BLHS.BLHS_DATE, BLHS.BLHS_TIME, 'NEW_BLOB', 'OLD_BLOB', concat( concat( cast(year(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(4)), case when length(trim(cast(month(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(2))))=2 then cast(month(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(2)) else concat('0',trim(cast(month(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(2)))) end ), case when ( length(trim(cast(day(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(2)))))=2 then cast(day(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(2)) else concat('0',trim(cast(day(BLHS.BLHS_DATE) as char(2)))) end )
FROM :1/BLHS AS BLHS join :2/QCOL as QCOL on QCOL.NAME=BLHS.BLHS_FIELD_NAME and QCOL_ENABLE_BXA460='Y'
where BLHS.BLHS_DATE between ':5' and ':6' and cast(substr(BLHS.BLHS_KEY,12,5) as integer )= QCOL.QCOL_ORDER_BXA460 and substr(BLHS.BLHS_KEY,1,4)< '0100'and BLHS.BLHS_USER<>'MAGIC'
order by 3,4,5,13
:8
:9
order by 2,1,9,10,4,5,13
:10 ;

Text.val: if the field is a blob field then the query do not contain the new and the
old value - values has to be taken trought a link
relevant only for PI.TYPE= 2, 3 or 4
if q.DBHS_KEY contains more than admno and clntno and the raprot type = '1'
the rest of the q.DBHS_KEY will be printed after the value between Parentheses
This in order to make it possible to uniquely identify the DB row
It is not necessary for other type reports (2,3,4) because the runs on DBHS_KEY
group level and therefore always uniquely identified
This level is relevant only if PI.TYPE=1 (Client changes)
This level is relevant only if PI.TYPE=2/3/4
filter rows (only for tables CDEP/CDRD )
and this is the reason why the header is printed on this level
and not on the group level (to prevent empty headers)
if first line for client(and PI.TYPE='1')- print header
if first line for deposit(and PI.TYPE='2/3/4' )-print header
for nun blob
for blob

ExpSyntax.val: (Trim ({0,1})='CDEP' OR Trim ({0,1})='CDRD') AND {0,34}={1,10} OR Trim ({0,1})<>'CDEP' AND Trim ({0,1})<>'CDRD'
